Sorry, but something went wrong: No authorization transaction to proceed authorize.
抱歉，出了點問題: 沒有授權交易可進行授權。

Sorry, but something went wrong: Invoice opening notice will be sent to you by email, and you will be notified by mail on your own initiative when you win the prize.
抱歉，出了點問題: 發票打開通知將通過電子郵件發送給您，當您獲獎時，將自動通過郵件通知您。

Sorry, but something went wrong: The member is unable to proceed the transaction.
The merchant cannot use the LINE Pay.
There is a history of transactions with the same transactionId.
抱歉，出了點問題: 存在具有相同transactionId的交易記錄。

Sorry, but something went wrong: The payment amount is different than the requested amount.
抱歉，出了點問題: 付款金額與請求的金額不同。

Sorry, but something went wrong: Payment request information is not found.
Must select a payment method and password authorization at the LINE Pay.
抱歉，出了點問題: 必須在LINE Pay中選擇付款方式和密碼授權。

Sorry, but something went wrong: Balance of the member's account has been changed.
A record of transaction with the same order number already exists.
抱歉，出了點問題: 具有相同訂單號的交易記錄已存在。

Sorry, but something went wrong: API call request has been duplicated.
A temporary error occurred while processing the credit card payment.
抱歉，出了點問題: 處理信用卡付款時發生暫時性錯誤。

Sorry, but something went wrong: The payment was refused due to suspected fraud.
抱歉，出了點問題: 由於涉嫌欺詐，付款被拒絕。

Sorry, but something went wrong: The credit card payment has temporarily stopped.
抱歉，出了點問題: 信用卡付款已暫時停止。

Sorry, but something went wrong: The credit card has been expired
The credit card has low balance
Exceeded the limit of the credit card per payment
抱歉，出了點問題: 超過每次付款的信用卡限額

Sorry, but something went wrong: The card has been reported as a stolen card.
The card is listed on the blacklist.
